concept.title: JSON Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the following properties for JSON data in Kafka:

strow.stentry:
Determines how the Kafka Consumer processes JSON content. Use one of the following options:
Array of Objects.
Multiple Objects.Should i say this is how we treat the data? Or do we put the data in this format? Confused.
Maximum length for a JSON object. Larger objects are not processed.
